LanguageData.GestateDaysSetting_desc: How many days on average a human pregnancy takes.\nRange: 15 / 60\nDefault: 45
LanguageData.ImpregnationChanceSetting_desc: Percentage chance of natural conception for female pawns, before age and health have been factored in.\nRange: 0.1 / 1.0\nDefault: 0.33
LanguageData.PregnancyDisabled_desc: Stops pawns from getting pregnant if you only want children in your game, or are using another mod which handles the pregnancy Hediff.
